content: this easy drawstring bag with circular bottom requires no sewing and it s big enough for running everyday errands it s worked with single_crochet in spirals using ombre yarn it s a perfect project for beginners measurements * circular bottom of the bag is 22 cm wide 8 66 in * the bag itself is 30 cm tall 11 8 in * string is 140 cm long ~55 in **free written pattern** available on crochetpedia com
